---
title: "Séries temporais"
---

```{r}
#install.packages("forecast")
library(forecast)
```

```{r}
AirPassengers
start(AirPassengers)
end(AirPassengers)
frequency(AirPassengers)
```

```{r}
plot(AirPassengers) #série temporal em si
plot(aggregate(AirPassengers)) #tendência
```

```{r}
subst = window(AirPassengers, start=c(1960,1), end=c(1960,12))
subst
plot(subst)
```
Decomposição
```{r}
dec = decompose(AirPassengers)
dec
```
```{r}
attributes(dec)
dec$seasonal
```
```{r}
plot(dec)
plot(dec$x)
plot(dec$seasonal)
plot(dec$trend)
plot(dec$random)
```
Previsão
```{r}
ets = ets(AirPassengers) #observações mais recentes tem influência maior sobre as previsões
ets
```
```{r}
previsao = forecast(ets, h=12)
plot(previsao)
```
```{r}
arima = auto.arima(AirPassengers)
arima
```
```{r}
previsao = forecast(arima, h=12)
plot(previsao)
```
